DOC.brief_summary: Comparisons two type rehabilitation robot upper extremity : 3 dimension exoskeleton type upper extremity robot vs. 2 dimension end-effector type robot )
DOC.brief_title: Comparisons Two Types Rehabilitation Robot Upper Extremities
DOC.criteria: Hemiplegic patient secondary first cerebrovascular accident Onset ≥ 3 month 8 ≤ FuglMeyer Assessment score ≤ 50 Shoulder elbow flexor spasticity modify ashworth scale ≤ 3 Cognitively intact enough understand follow instruction investigator History surgery affect upper limb Fracture affect upper limb
